lead_paragraph: With Gilbert Arenas slowed again by Chicago, the Washington Wizards relied on strong contributions from Caron Butler, Antonio Daniels and DeShawn Stevenson to defeat the visiting Bulls, 113-103, last night for their seventh consecutive victory at home.
